favourite.article: Praise be to the One Who reigns on high! Bless His name forever! Hymnal.net is an excellent way to learn and sing all sorts of hymns. To everyone in the world who has been blessed by this website and who has discovered Hymnal.net, just keep singing and let us fill the earth with praise to Him who reigns on high!
Thanks for the songs and may God bless you for the great work you have done by making the songs available to everyone for free. Thank you!
Praise God! Blessed be His name forever and ever, Amen!
All praise to Him who reigns on high, in majesty supreme, who gave His life for man to die, that He might man redeem. Blessed be His glorious, precious, and holy name! What a great God we serve!
